Reviews.Title: This is everything proof
Reviews.Author: D34DGoth
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that could hold the Afghanistan life, well, this one meets all requirements and meets the best of them all, it is against unprofessional photographers :D point and shoot, this thing will make your pictures look like if a pro did them.It is money well spent.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 11 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Pentax WG-3 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Black) + <2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<3> Spare Li-50B/D-LI92 Battery + <4> Lowepro Rezo 50 Camera Case + <5> Floating Foam Camera Strap +
<6> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod + <7> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <8> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable +
<9> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <10> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <11> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax WG-3 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Black) with 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flex Tripod + Float Strap + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
